categories.title: Recent Updates and Enhancements in ElizaOS

content.text: The ElizaOS project has seen several updates and enhancements across various components. Notably, new character methods have been added, although they have not been fully tested and may increase the size of the adapter.
A new build command `build:core` has been introduced to ensure the core is built first, addressing previous build issues.
The build process has been fixed for the root directory using `bun run build`, and additional fixes were made for the Sui Typhoon Hackathon scheduled for February 2025.
Enhancements have been made to the Twitter client system message, character file, and Shopify parsing logic to better handle Twitter data.
A new feature, VangAI, has been introduced as a Crypto Oracle, and a new database adapter using Drizzle ORM has been implemented, enhancing database schema management and vector operations.
The project has externalized vendor code, moving model providers into plugins and switching from `pnpm` to `bun` to enable better scalability.
The README.md file has been enhanced with detailed system requirements, project structure overview, and comprehensive contribution guidelines to make the project more accessible to new contributors.

The cryptocurrency market is experiencing varied movements across different assets. Bitcoin, with a current price of $96,200, has a significant 24-hour trading volume of $26,612,820,142 and a market cap of $1,906,773,302,781. However, it has seen a daily change of -560.79, indicating a downward trend.
Ethereum is currently priced at $2,618.7, with a 24-hour trading volume of $18,063,719,203 and a market cap of $315,781,496,346. It has experienced a daily change of -31.57, showing a slight decline.
Solana's current price is $201.63, with a 24-hour trading volume of $4,075,557,842 and a market cap of $98,393,496,850. It has seen a minor daily increase of 0.61.
The token ai16z is priced at $0.3796, with a 24-hour trading volume of $22,096,830.93 and a market cap of $417,575,466. It has experienced a notable daily increase of 10.47.

Attention DEVS: The plugin registry migration for ElizaOS is currently in progress. Developers can submit their plugins to the new registry by sending a pull request to the index.json file, which can be hosted on their GitHub. New documentation is being developed and will be shared once ready.

categories.title: Recent Developments in ElizaOS and Related Projects

content.text: Bot Generates Multiple Replies Due to DEFAULT_MAX_TWEET_LENGTH. The bot sometimes generates multiple replies to a single tweet due to the 280-character limit, leading to excessive API calls and increased costs. A temporary fix is to increase the DEFAULT_MAX_TWEET_LENGTH.
Attention DEVS: plugin registry migration in progress. ElizaOS plugins can be submitted via PR to the index.json hosted on GitHub. New documentation is being prepared.
Some highlights from the past few days of building include improvements by @AshConnell and work by @itsmetamike.
